rules.name: editableSign
rules.description: Player can edit the sign when it's right-clicked if the player is sneaking and not holding anything in the main hand.

rules.name: flintAndSteelActivatesObserver
rules.description: Observer will be activied when player uses Flint and Steel on it. Sneak to light fire on observers.

rules.name: runCommandOnSign
rules.description: Execute the command on the sign if it's right-clicked by player who is not sneaking nor holding anything in the main hand. Texts must start with '/'.
